Our prayers this morning for the quick recovery of @repjohnlewis. May God restore his health & strength. Get well soon.

Americans are wise to Republicans’ #GOPTaxScam for the rich, their attempts to obliterate our health care, their quest to destroy women's rights, and so much more.

We won’t let Trump have another two years of a friendly House. #100DaysOut
You’re never too young or too old to start being a leader. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DjStOVjU4AALCTQ.jpg

Too many women and girls who suffer from crippling endometriosis are told it’s all in their head. It's not. It's a serious health condition. We need to talk about it. We need to raise awareness and remove the stigma. We need to work together to study it & find a cure. https://twitter.com/endowhat/status/1011603950792007680 QT @EndoWhat We’re honored to work with @SenWarren & @senorrinhatch on a groundbreaking, bi-partisan initiative to create widespread awareness & meaningful change for the millions of people living with #endometriosis. To learn more watch the video & visit http://www.EndoWhat.org! http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1011603347181326336/pu/img/5yB9Ft1o0AGzCBEM.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1011603347181326336/pu/vid/320x180/BZpnwcZWj71gIAyr.mp4?tag=3

RT @jorge_aguilarDC When you hear Republicans say, 'we don't want to see Nancy Pelosi as Speaker,' what they mean is that they don't want to see:

-People's health care strengthened
-Families kept together
-Common-sense gun safety measures enacted
-Medicare, Medicaid & Social Security protected

I've been a big fan of @kristatippett & her show @onbeing for some time now. Grateful & honored that she invited me on for a conversation.  

We discussed “Civic Spirituality” and more: https://onbeing.org/programs/cory-booker-civic-spiritual-evolution-jul2018/

What’s one thing Donald Trump wanted to desperately pass? The #GOPTaxScam. Why? Because he knew it would overwhelming benefit the already-rich. Now, they’re plotting to destroy your Medicare, Medicaid and Social Security. This isn’t a lie.

Keeping pregnant women shackled in detention centers is inhumane and unsafe. My colleagues and I are trying to put an end to this practice.
